fields.body:
Dear {{retailer.first_name}}:

A new order has been placed by {{shopper.first_name}} {{shopper.last_name}}.
Please login {{url}} to complete your order. Just click get label to retrieve and print your FedEx Shipping label and packing slip and then drop off the package at the nearest FedEx/Kinkos Location. If you prefer, you may also arrange a pickup by contacting FedEx directly or visiting their website.

Cheers!

Sam, Brie, and Lizzy
Stunable Co-Founders
fields.name: retailer-order-placed
fields.subject: An Order has been placed

fields.body:
Dear {{shopper.first_name}}:

Your order {{order_ref}} has been refunded. Feel free to contact us at orders@shopwithstella.com if you have any questions, comments, or concerns.

Cheers!

Sam, Brie, and Lizzy
Stunable Co-Founders
fields.name: retailer-item-returned
fields.subject: Your order has been refunded

fields.body:
Dear {{retailer.first_name}}:

An order was placed by {{shopper.first_name}} {{shopper.last_name} on {order.purchased_at} and needs to be shipped. Please login {{url}} and update the status of the order or else the order will be cancelled and refunded to the buyer.

Cheers!

Sam, Brie, and Lizzy
Stunable Co-Founders
fields.name: retailer-reminder
fields.subject: ACTION: An Order has been placed

fields.body:
Dear {{shopper.first_name}}:

Your order {{order.ref}} has been refunded. Feel free to contact us at orders@shopwithstella.com if you have any questions, comments, or concerns.

Cheers!

Sam, Brie, and Lizzy
Stunable Co-Founders
fields.name: retailer-forced-refund
fields.subject: Your order has been refunded

fields.body:
Dear {{retailer.first_name}}:

{{shopper.first_name}} {{shopper.last_name}} has requested a refund on {{order.ref}} placed on {{order.purchased_at}}. Please login {{url}} to process the refund.

Cheers!

Sam, Brie, and Lizzy
Stunable Co-Founders
fields.name: shopper-refund-requested
fields.subject: Refund requested

fields.body:
Dear {{shopper.first_name}}:

Your order:  {{order.ref}} placed on {{order.purchased_at}} has now shipped. It can be tracked by  {{item.shipping_number}}

Thank you for your order !

Sam, Brie, and Lizzy
Stunable Co-Founders
fields.name: shopper-item-shipped
fields.subject: Your order has been shipped

fields.body:
Dear {{recipient.first_name}}:

{{sender.first_name}} {{sender.last_name}} wants to Shop with you. To Shop together, click here {{ approval_link }}

Cheers!

Sam, Brie, and Lizzy
Stunable Co-Founders
fields.name: friend-invite-sent
fields.subject: Someone wants to be friends

fields.body:
Dear {{ sender.first_name }}:

{{recipient_first_name}} has accepted your request to shop together 

Cheers!

Sam, Brie, and Lizzy
Stunable Co-Founders
fields.name: friend-invite-accept
fields.subject: {{recipient.first_name}} {{ recipient.last_name }} accepts !

fields.body:
Dear {{ recipient.first_name }}:

{{ sender.first_name }} {{ sender.last_name}} has shared {{ rack.name }} with you. To view this rack and the rest of {{ sender.first_name }}'s closet, click here {{ rack_url }}

Cheers!

Sam, Brie, and Lizzy
Stunable Co-Founders
fields.name: share-rack
fields.subject: A Rack has been shared with you !

fields.body:
Dear {{ recipient.first_name }}:

{{ sender.first_name}} {{ sender.last_name}} has shared {{ item.brand}}.{{item.name}} with you. To view this this product and the rest of {{sender.first_name}}'s closet, click here {{ trend_url }}

Cheers!

Sam, Brie, and Lizzy
Stunable Co-Founders
fields.name: share-item
fields.subject: An Item has been shared with you!
